tool_description: Generates comprehensive formatted reports combining multiple analysis results into executive summaries, detailed reports, and visualizations.

analysis_results.description: Array of analysis result identifiers to include in report

report_format.description: Output format for the report (executive, detailed, presentation, dashboard)

include_visualizations.description: Whether to include charts and graphs in report

target_audience.description: Intended audience for report tone and detail level (executive, marketing, technical)

custom_branding.description: Whether to apply custom branding to report

error_messages: No analysis results: At least one analysis result is required for report generation
Invalid report format: Format must be one of [executive, detailed, presentation, dashboard]
Incomplete analysis data: Some analysis results are incomplete or corrupted
Invalid target audience: Must be one of [executive, marketing, technical]
Report generation failed: Unable to compile analysis results into requested format
usage: Provide analysis_results array and specify report_format. Customize with visualization inclusion, target_audience specification, and custom_branding options.

total_pages.description: Total number of pages in generated report

key_findings.description: Summary of key findings from analysis
